channel.title: Client help :(
channel.description:
I know this is the wrong section but, That other section no one helps. [size=16pt][b]REP++++ IF YOU CAN HELP ME[/b][/size]
I am attempting to add dragonclaw models to the [b]battlescape client.[/b]
i am new to client editing
I am using this guide as an outline, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html Following the "tut" this is what i get...
[URL=http://img9.imageshack.us/i/clienterros.png/][IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/2944/clienterros.png[/img][/URL]
I'll specify my question:
Where do I add the new models, for battlescape client, It doesn't have Class 8. It Has itemdef instead, and Ive tried 3 ways to get the models added in, Each time It can't find the model. I know there is a DFS already added in, but I have no idea where that model is. Ive searched all overall files looking for the dfs model id, No luck.
Help pl0x

item.title: Client help :(
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

METHOD:

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:1, topic:346784”]I am using this guide as an outline, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html
Following the “tut” this is what i get…

[/quote]
1st. I converted to mpo
2nd. I converted back to .dat
3rd. I placed in Gzip file
4th. I dragged on to gzip.exe Which made them.rar
5th. I added them to Models folder.
6th. I tried not renaming them, renaming them, And making up random names all 3 times
7th. I logged in to client, Typed addmodel 8002 (or what ever the name was.)
“unable to find model”

Read full topic

item.title: Client help :(
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

ok tell the method before you added the models into your models folder

  1. did you go to datmaker?
  2. are you sure you gzipped?
    dont just answer them, tell the method you used.

Read full topic
